name: Can Your Talking?
description:
Cute Talking pet!
Teach your talking to your pet
This is 'Can Your Pet' series

Cute Talking pet!
This is your pet chick, that responds to your touch and repeats everything you say with a funny voice.
You can pet him, poke him or feed or shower


also, Smart Talking to learn to say the app will be available
Teach your talking to your pet

apps like 'Talking Tom'
And more say learn is a funny

Enjoy hours of fun and laughter with Pet.

----------------------------------------------
mission:
● Decorate and feed your pet.
● Clean and train your pet.
● Let's play Talk!
----------------------------------------------



Hello
I will answer any questions, using a translator.
Thank you
- Can Your Talking
